The point of an assert is to fail the test if the assert fails.  If you 
don't want to fail the test, use 'if' instead. 

Mike Foley wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> So all the various assert methods all return void. How would I go
> about getting a boolean telling me the result of an assert? I need to
> do something with this information.
>
> Mike
>
>
